definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
see 香噴噴|香喷喷[xiang1 pen1 pen1]

sentences.english: And we have a delicious shrimp dish in a garlic sauce served over rice.
sentences.chinese: 另外有喷香的蒜蓉虾饭。

sentences.english: Meadows still smell of hay and the sweetness of cut grass.
sentences.chinese: 草场上披发着新草垛及新刈绿草的清喷香。

sentences.english: The cake baking in the oven made the whole house fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 炉上烤的蛋糕使满屋子气味喷香。

sentences.english: Combination of grilled chicken, chicken hearts with onions and special spices.
sentences.chinese: 结合了鲜嫩的鸡肉和小块的鸡心，喷香美味尽在其中。

sentences.english: Does your right to wear perfume end at my nose?
sentences.chinese: 请问您有权利喷香水喷到我的鼻子里吗？

sentences.english: The best way to do this, in addition to bathing and brushing your teeth, is to wear perfume.
sentences.chinese: 除了洗澡刷牙，喷香水也能给人一种优雅温和的感觉。

definition: see 香噴噴|香喷喷[xiang1 pen1 pen1]
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
to make one's mouth water/appetizing/greedy person/glutton
